recipes.title: Same-kiri Bocho
lines: The §lSame-kiri Bocho§r is a large zanbato, with a design similar to a cleaver, with string tassel tied at the pommel of the handle.

recipes.title: Pretzel
lines: §lPretzel§r is the name of Charlotte Cracker's sword. It is a longsword which Cracker states holds no equal.
